title: Here is a reading list of 20 articles on the security, privacy, and copyright aspects of large language models (LLMs) that you can explore before 2025. These articles cover a range of topics from technical vulnerabilities to ethical and legal considerations
**"Adversarial Attacks on Large Language Models: A Survey"** - This article reviews various adversarial attack techniques and their implications for LLMs
**"Mitigating Security Risks in Large Language Models"** - Discusses strategies for reducing security vulnerabilities in LLMs
**"Robustness of Large Language Models Against Data Poisoning"** - Explores how data poisoning can affect the performance and reliability of LLMs
**"Securing LLMs in Cloud Environments"** - Focuses on the specific challenges and solutions for deploying LLMs securely in cloud infrastructures
**"Evaluating the Security of LLM APIs"** - Analyzes the security risks associated with public APIs for LLMs and offers best practices for mitigation
**"Privacy Risks in Large Language Models: An Overview"** - Provides a comprehensive overview of privacy risks associated with LLMs
**"Differential Privacy in Large Language Models"** - Discusses the application of differential privacy techniques to protect user data in LLMs
**"User Data Leakage in LLMs: Case Studies and Solutions"** - Presents case studies of data leakage incidents and proposes solutions
**"Privacy-Preserving Training Techniques for LLMs"** - Reviews various techniques for training LLMs while preserving user privacy
**"Regulatory Compliance for Privacy in LLMs"** - Examines how LLMs can comply with privacy regulations like GDPR and CCPA
**"Copyright Challenges in the Age of Large Language Models"** - Discusses the legal challenges related to copyright in the context of LLMs
**"Fair Use and Large Language Models: A Legal Perspective"** - Analyzes how fair use doctrine applies to the training and deployment of LLMs
**"Copyright Infringement Risks in LLM Outputs"** - Explores the potential for LLM-generated content to infringe on existing copyrights
**"Licensing Issues for Training Data in LLMs"** - Reviews the complexities of licensing data for training LLMs
**"Intellectual Property Rights and LLMs: A Global Perspective"** - Provides an international view on how different jurisdictions handle IP rights related to LLMs
**"Ethical Considerations in the Deployment of Large Language Models"** - Discusses the ethical implications of deploying LLMs in various applications
**"Bias and Fairness in Large Language Models: Ethical and Legal Implications"** - Examines the ethical and legal issues related to bias and fairness in LLMs
**"Transparency and Accountability in Large Language Models"** - Focuses on the need for transparency and accountability in the development and deployment of LLMs
**"The Role of Human Oversight in Large Language Models"** - Discusses the importance of human oversight to ensure ethical use of LLMs
**"Interdisciplinary Approaches to Addressing Security, Privacy, and Copyright in LLMs"** - Highlights the need for interdisciplinary collaboration to tackle the complex issues surrounding LLMs
These articles should provide a well-rounded understanding of the various challenges and considerations related to the security, privacy, and copyright aspects of large language models
